author: shazron
msg: Fixed crash that happened when running the unit-tests

author: shazron
msg: Cleaned up static analyzer warnings (from Xcode 4.1)

author: pillepop2003@yahoo.de
msg: location retrieval only started after timeout. fixed by calling it
immediately and setting a timeout afterwards.

author: mschulkind@gmail.com
msg: Fix a race condition in PhoneGap.exec().
Queue up a fully formed URL instead of just the arguments to
PhoneGap.exec(). This effectively clones the command arguments and
avoids unexpected behavior when the command's arguments are mutated soon
